description:
With all five frogs together, Keroro is determined to begin the invasion of Earth in earnest.  But Dororo rejects all of his (insane, harmful) plans!  So the only thing to do is to follow the one thing Dororo wants: the "Fill the Town with Flowers" Master Plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gonin Shuuketsu! Tabun Shijousaidai no Sakusen de Arimasu
五人集結! たぶん史上最大の作戦 であります
